item.title: Criteo provides three suggestions for increasing sales conversions
item.description: Criteo, a company specializing in digital performance display advertising, offers advice based on its collaborations within the travel industry on converting leads into customers. This guidance is relevant across all sectors. Tip #1: Strategically Time Your User Acquisition Travel app downloads peak during summer (June-September), providing a window before peak season to engage a larger active user base*. Capitalize on your customers’ planning and buying cycles by aligning download promotions for optimal new customer acquisition, Criteo recommends.

item.title: The most effective productivity hacks for Microsoft Office
item.description: Microsoft Office 2013 offers several improvements over previous versions, but long-time users may not be aware of these useful additions. At the Singapore launch of Office 365 Personal, Elsie Chong, Marketing Manager for Microsoft Singapore, highlighted her favorite new features: PDF Reflow in Word 2013 allows users to open PDF files as editable Word documents, retaining the original formatting as much as possible. The modified document can be saved as a PDF or a Word file.

item.title: Genesys provides insights on improving e-commerce strategies for Asian businesses
item.description: Source: Genesys. Thomassain. According to Genesys, a company that provides customer experience platforms, many businesses are not meeting the demands of e-commerce or changing along with their customers’ expectations. Genesys’ Head of Marketing in the Asia Pacific, Erwann Thomassain, cites a Forrester report predicting that in the coming years, abandoned online shopping carts will cost businesses $31 billion dollars. He goes on to reference a 2013 Forrester study that found 52% of customers abandon online purchases when they can’t get a quick answer to their question.
